item.title: Remove public from url in laravel framework
item.dc:creator: Avinash Dalvi
item.description:
Follow below step to remove public from url :- copied the .htaccess file from /public directory to my Laravel(project) root folder. Renamed the server.php in the my Laravel root folder to index.php and its worked for me.

The post Remove public from url in laravel framework appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Follow below step to remove public from url :-

  1. copied the .htaccess file from /public directory to my Laravel(project) root folder.
  2. Renamed the server.php in the my Laravel root folder to index.php and its worked for me.

The post Remove public from url in laravel framework appeared first on .

item.title: The requested URL /index.php was not found on this server – WordPress
item.dc:creator: Suraj Koli
item.description:
Steps : 1) Login to wp-admin 2) Go to settings –>  permalinks –> permalink setting 3) Navigate to end of page and copy the .htaccess code. 4) paste it into your .htaccess file. 5) enjoy..

The post The requested URL /index.php was not found on this server – WordPress appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Steps :

1) Login to wp-admin

2) Go to settings –>  permalinks –> permalink setting

3) Navigate to end of page and copy the .htaccess code.

4) paste it into your .htaccess file.

5) enjoy..

The post The requested URL /index.php was not found on this server – WordPress appeared first on .
